short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you save URLs and alerts you whenever you visit saved URLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows you to save important URLs and provides notifications when you revisit those saved links. It helps you keep track of important sites, especially for managing product or service domains, ensuring you never miss out on returning to the websites that matter most. With a simple user interface and real-time alerts, this tool is ideal for users who frequently navigate multiple URLs and want an easy way to remember and get notified when they access saved domains. Whether you're managing personal projects or keeping an eye on business websites, this extension will streamline your workflow.
